page.title: 08F of D Events-Organisations
page.content: During year{Morris Dancers}perform in centre of{Coleford.Every May Bank {Holiday Coleford Carnival}is held.You can enter a{float}or{dress}up as a {character}and walk in a procession through town to{Buchannan Recreation {Ground. Prizes}are presented by{judges to most{imaginative floats}and walkers.Many people from{Coleford}and surrounding area come and enjoy themselves.In August a{vegetable}and {flower show}is held.Gardeners enter {competitions}with{onions,potatoes,carr {ots,beans}and{tomatoes.Ladies}enter home made{cakes,jams,pickles and {wines.In}November a{Chrysanthemum}Show is held.The town has a{silver band,a {jazz band}and the{Coleford Amateur {Dramatic Society.A torchlight procession is held before the {Christmas lights}are turned on.
